titleStmt.title: York, the 24th. and 25th. of the 4th. month, 1696
titleStmt.author: Yearly Meeting of Women Friends
Breckon, Margaret.
Winn, Katharine.

notesStmt.note: First line begins: "We being met together at this our yearly meeting ..."
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
